projects.name: Swatch. Find your true colors.
projects.desc: Swatch is an iPad® and iPhone® app made for professionals by professionals. Whether you are a graphic designer, web developer, interior decorator, ready to paint your house or just interested in the creative use of colour, Swatch is for you.

projects.name: Médecins Sans Frontières
projects.desc: Working with global charity MSF, this microsite successfully helped to promote current issues and drive donations from a younger demographic. It's templated design empowered content managers to periodically refresh the site's content with minimal overhead.

projects.name: Typicons
projects.desc: Typicons are free-to-use vector icons embedded in a webfont for easy use in user interfaces, whether it be on the web or in a native application. They were developed at the start of the font icon revolution to fill a void that had existed and still enjoy a high level of popularity.
